price: I bī rečeno: “Uđi u džennet!”, a on reče: “Kamo sreće da narod moj zna
arabic: قِيلَ ٱدۡخُلِ ٱلۡجَنَّةَۖ قَالَ يَٰلَيۡتَ قَوۡمِي يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qīla ud'khuli al-janata qāla yālayta qawmī yaʿlamūna
